sentences.en: Basic ecology has similarly been ignored in many agricultural schools and universities.
sentences.cn: 同样,许多农学院和农业大学中也忽视基础生态学.

sentences.en: Descriptive ecology is a dry subject.
sentences.cn: 描述性的生态学是干燥无味的课题.

sentences.en: Development has been guided by a concern for the ecology of the area.
sentences.cn: 该地区的发展以注重生态为指导原则。

sentences.en: Dynamics, functional relationships, and control mechanisms are key words in an evolutionary ecology.
sentences.cn: 动态, 功能关系和调节机制是进化生态学中三个关键字眼.

sentences.en: Ecology as a subject has many stimulating characteristics.
sentences.cn: 生态学作为课题具有许多有兴趣的特点.

sentences.en: Fossils allow us to reconstruct ancient ecology.
sentences.cn: 化石可以让我们知道古时的生态环境。

sentences.en: It is science that teaches us to respect the natural ecology.
sentences.cn: 是科学,让我们懂得尊重自然生态.

sentences.en: Orff's landscape design focuses on urban ecology and public space design.
sentences.cn: 欧福的景观设计集中在城市生态学和公共空间的设计上.

sentences.en: Studies of botanical ecology generally advanced more rapidly than those involving animals.
sentences.cn: 对植物生态学的研究通常比动物生态学的研究进展更为迅速.

sentences.en: The action of a pathogen and an insect vector changed the ecology of the rabbit.
sentences.cn: 病原体和昆虫媒介改变了兔子的生态学.

sentences.en: The concept of ecology finds its immediate historical origins in Darwin's'web of life '.
sentences.cn: 生态学这一概念从历史上说直接源于达尔文的 “ 生命之网 ”.

sentences.en: The extensive formwork used during casting often has undesirable effects on the environment or the ecology.
sentences.cn: 在浇筑混凝土时所用的大批模板往往对环境或生态平衡有着不良的影响.

sentences.en: the natural ecology of the Earth
To keep ecology in balance is our duty.
sentences.cn: 保持生态平衡是我们的职责.

sentences.en: We are reproducing ourselves at such a rate that our numbers threaten the ecology of the planet.
sentences.cn: 我们的繁衍速度太快，以至于人口数量对地球的生态系统造成了威胁。

sentences.en: We will consider all of the systems listed in our examination of agricultural ecology.
sentences.cn: 我们考虑把所有的系统列入我们农业生态学的研究范畴.

phrases.tran_cn: 水域生态学；水生生物生态学
社会生态学；全球生态学
传媒生态；传播媒介生态学
种群生态学，群体生态学

trans.tran_en: the way in which plants, animals, and people are related to each other and to their environment, or the scientific study of this
